Verses: 1 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Yoodhaa Dhesaththil Raajaavaaga Niyamiththa Yoyaakkeemudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Koniyaavin Pattaththukku Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Vandhu Arasaandaan.
2 karththar Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaikkondu Sonna Vaarththaigalukku Avanaagilum, Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaagilum, Dhesaththin Janangalaagilum Sevikodukkavillai.

3 sidhekkiyaa Raajaavovenil, Selemiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yookaalaiyum, Maaseyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seppaniyaa Ennum Aasaariyanaiyum Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyinidaththil Anuppi: Nee Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nokki Engalukkaaga Vinnappampannavendum Endru Solla Sonnaan.
4 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Janaththin Naduve Varaththum Pokkumaayirundhaan; Avanai Avargal Kaaval Veettil Innum Podavillai.
5 paarvonin Senaiyovendraal, Egipthilirundhu Purappattadhu; Erusalemai Mutrikkaipotta Kaldheyar Avargaludaiya Seydhiyaikkettu, Erusalemaivittu Neengipponaargal.
6 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisikkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar,

7 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Ennidaththil Visaarikkumpadi Ungalai Ennidaththirku Anuppina Yoodhaavin Raajaavai Neengal Nokki: Idho, Ungalukku Oththaasaiyaagap Purappatta Paarvonin Senai Than Dhesamaagiya Egipthukkuth Thirumbippogum.
8 kaldheyarovendraal, Thirumbi Vandhu Indha Nagaraththukku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanni, Adhaip Pidiththu, Akkiniyaal Sutterippaargal.
9 kaldheyar Nammaivittu Nichchayamaaip Poividuvaargalendru Solli, Neengal Mosampogaadhirungal, Avargal Povadhillai.

10 ungalode Yuththampannugira Kaldheyarudaiya Senaiyaiyellaam Neengal Muriya Adiththaalum, Meendhavargal Ellaarum Kaayampattavargalaayirundhaalum, Avargal Thangal Koodaarangalilirundhu Ezhumbi, Indha Nagaraththai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaargalendru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollungal Endraar.
11 paarvonin Senai Varugiradhendru, Kaldheyarudaiya Senai Erusalemaivittup Ponapodhu,
12 eremiyaa Avvidaththaivittu, Janaththin Naduve Jaadaiyaai Vilagi, Benyameen Dhesaththukkup Poga Manadhaai Erusalemilirundhu Purappattupponaan.

13 avan Benyameen Vaasalil Vandhapodhu, Kaavarchervaiyin Adhipadhiyaagiya Yeriyaa Ennum Naamamulla Oruvan Ange Irundhaan; Avan Ananiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Selemiyaavin Magan; Avan: Nee Kaldheyarai Serappogiravan Endru Solli, Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaip Pidiththaan.
14 appozhudhu Eremiyaa: Adhu Poi, Naan Kaldheyarai Serappogiravanalla Endraan; Aanaalum Yeriyaa Eremiyaavinsollaik Kelaamal, Avanaip Pidiththu, Prabukkalidaththil Konduponaan.
15 appozhudhu Prabukkal: Eremiyaavinperil Kadunkobankondu, Avanai Adiththu, Avanai Sambiradhiyaagiya Yonaththaanudaiya Veettil Kaavarpaduththinaargal; Avargal Adhaik Kaavar Koodamaakkiyirundhaargal.
16 appadiye Eremiyaa Kaavarkidangin Nilavaraigalil Pravesiththu, Ange Aneganaal Irundhaan.

17 pinbu Sidhekkiyaa Raajaa Avanai Azhaiththanuppi: Karththaraal Oru Vaarththai Undo Endru Raajaa Avanaith Than Veettile Ragasiyamaaik Kettaan. Adharku Eremiyaa: Undu, Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduveer Endru Sonnaan.
18 pinnum Eremiyaa, Sidhekkiyaa Raajaavai Nokki: Neengal Ennaik Kaaval Veettile Adaippadharku, Naan Umakkum Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkum Indha Janaththukkum Virodhamaaga Enna Kutrancheydhen?
19 baabilon Raajaa Ungalukkum Indha Dhesaththukkum Virodhamaaga Varuvadhillaiyendru Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Sonna Ungaludaiya Theerkkadharisigal Enge?

20 ippodhum Raajaavaagiya En Aandavane, Enakku Sevikoduththu, En Vinnappaththukku Dhayaiseydhu, Ennai Sambiradhiyaagiya Yonaththaanudaiya Veettirkuth Thirumba Anuppavendaam; Anuppinaal Naan Ange Seththuppoven Endraan.

21 appozhudhu Eremiyaavaik Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththile Kaakkavum, Nagaraththile Appamirukkumattum Appanchudugiravargalin Veedhiyile Dhinam Oru Appaththai Avanukku Vaangik Kodukkavum Kattalaiyittaan; Appadiye Eremiyaa Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththile Irundhaan.
